name: Tea Party (HossamEL2006)
description:
This game is made in around 6 hours for the Trijam#156 under the theme: TeaTime.

  Pixelart: 1h

  Programming: 1h 30min

  Level design: 2h

  UI - Bug fixing - Polishing: 1h 30min

You can find a short gameplay video of this game on my youtube channel [SPOILERS AHEAD]: Click here.

Credits:

SFX from: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/ / https://mixkit.co/

Music: by Eric Matyas www.soundimage.org

Tileset: "A platformer in the forest" by Buch http://blog-buch.rhcloud.com

Font: Pixelated by Skylar Park  / 04b_30 par 04

Previous Trijam:

For the previous jam (Trijam#155), I submitted the game "Speedrun Unlocked !", you all told me that the game starts hard and that the game does not give the player time to familiarize himself with its mechanics, so now I made this game with 10 levels, the first ones are easy, and the last ones are very hard and challenging!

Tools Used:

Game Engine: Unity

Programming Language: C#

IDE: Visual Studio 2019

Image Editor: Piskel
